attributes.action: ensure that convicted sex offenders are given access to treatment progranmmes, regardless of if they are currently on probation or in prison
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a fact of life that many sex offenders in the community are not able to access suitable treatment programmes because they are either not in the system of the probation service or in prison. Many sex offenders want help, but they cannot source it. This should be available to anyone that wants it, as soon as they want it.
